definition[0]: to finish the last part of a plan, business deal etc
example[0]: Jo flew out to Thailand to finalize the details of the deal.
definition[1]: to finish or agree to the last part of to an arrangement, plan, business deal etc
example[1]: Mike flew out to Japan to finalize the details of the deal.
example[2]: British Aerospace is about to finalise a Â£240 million joint venture with Taiwan Aerospace to manufacture regional jets.
